title: Hearsona
subtitle: Thesis Project • 2025
shortDescription: Developed a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) generative AI tool for creating personalized audio cues.
fullDescription: Engineered a Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) generative AI pipeline that empowers users to co-create personalized auditory cues. The system integrates Mistral 7B for intent reasoning and AudioLDM2 for synthesis, allowing users to iteratively refine outputs through natural language feedback and fine-grained controls. This interactive workflow ensures the generated cues are not only high-fidelity but semantically aligned with the user’s specific cognitive associations.

title: O-VR Hear Space
subtitle: Thesis Project • 2025
shortDescription: Engineered a VR environment to evaluate spatial audio personalization, utilizing NASA-TLX, UEQ-S, and search time for performance validation.
fullDescription: This project investigates the impact of cognitive-level personalization in spatial audio on object localization in Virtual Reality. Using the Meta XR SDK and Unity, we developed an environment to test how specific cues improve sound source localization. The study evaluates cue effectiveness by measuring search time and validating results through integrated in-VR questionnaires, including the NASA-TLX for workload and UEQ-S for user experience.

title: Distributed OCR System
subtitle: Academic Project • 2025
shortDescription: Engineered a fault-tolerant client-server architecture for extracting text from images. Implemented multithreading with OpenCV and Tesseract for high-throughput processing.
fullDescription: A robust distributed system designed for high-throughput Optical Character Recognition (OCR). The system employs a client-server architecture using gRPC for communication. It features fault tolerance mechanisms and utilizes multithreading to parallelize image processing tasks using OpenCV and Tesseract, ensuring efficient text extraction even under heavy loads.

title: Lexson System
subtitle: Client-Based Project • 2023
shortDescription: Developed a custom inventory and billing system, automating manual business processes to eliminate data entry errors.
fullDescription: Designed and deployed a bespoke inventory and billing management system tailored to streamline the client's end-to-end business operations. By transitioning the organization from manual record-keeping to a centralized digital architecture, the system automated critical workflows ranging from stock monitoring to invoicing. This digital transformation eliminated manual data entry errors, accelerated order processing times, and provided real-time visibility into financial and inventory metrics.
